tasks.label: Test Minimal Payloads
args:
üß™ TESTING MINIMAL PAYLOADS - Open Browser DevTools!

1. Start dev server: npm run dev
2. Open: http://localhost:3000/collections
3. Select any collection (e.g., Partners)
4. Edit an existing item
5. Open Browser DevTools -> Console
6. Change ONLY the title field
7. Click 'Save as Draft' or 'Publish'
8. Look for these console logs:
   ‚Ä¢ 'üîç Change detection:' - shows what changed
   ‚Ä¢ 'üîÑ Optimized API Data:' - shows minimal payload
   ‚Ä¢ 'üì§ Sending minimal update payload:' - from context

‚úÖ SUCCESS: You should see {"title": "New Title"}
‚ùå FAILURE: You see full object with type, data, etc.

Test other scenarios:
‚Ä¢ Change only status: should send {"status": "published"}
‚Ä¢ Change title + slug: should send {"title": "...", "slug": "..."}
‚Ä¢ Change description: should send full payload

This matches your working curl command! üöÄ
